post.body: I will gladly help out. I'm even better at using nervous energy to clean other people's places than my own
another very true statement. you are wise.
it's true. that is a good idea. I have actually done that. But lately I tend to reserve my cleaning binges for when I'm nervous ...
I used to live in new york, that was fun. Paris was fun. Amsterdam was fun. Now look what I'm ffffin stuck with LA =BLAH
it would be except it's 130 am here soooooooooo plus I'm damn lazy so I hardly ever clean
ain't that the truth.
*sniffles* .... um. hurry back! :)
nite !
who is Kari Byron?
I just followed you, I hope I'm not the weird porn site! lol
still alive over there Abe?
Ahhhh Hahahahahah LOL Best.Profile.Ever.

pretty good but so tired all of a sudden! better check back in with you guys tomorrow, nice tat, btw! ;)
hello!
very interesting post! hard to respond in tweets...I liked reading it. I've got a lot to say in response...will respond in a few :)
reading now!
you are funny ! comparing the Iphone to a flu shot lol nice!
: thank you! ♪ ♪ ♪ ♪ ♪ :)
thanks! :) I appreciate the feedback. I really want one. We'll see. I'm so slow when it comes to new purchases...procrastinating!:)
I think someone dropped me cuz I cursed. Buuuubye then.
...about the outcome of something that I can't control. Then I clean furiously until I find out what the outcome is. It helps.
that's it. I've decided. it's a movie next. A MOTHAFUCKIN BIG ONE. A BIG ONE.

just a little curve for now but im still thrilled!
